item.title: Rules of Thumb for MongoDB Schema Design
item.dc:creator: pinal.bhatt
item.description:
NoSQL databases are normally schema-less, still, we need some sort of schemas defined to work practically. And we need proper mindset and understanding for designing schemas for NoSQL databases like MongoDB. Here is the nice set of articles from MongoDB blog on 6 Rules of Thumb for MongoDB Schema Design By William Zola, Lead Technical Support […]

The post Rules of Thumb for MongoDB Schema Design appeared first on PBDesk.
item.content:encoded:
NoSQL databases are normally schema-less, still, we need some sort of schemas defined to work practically. And we need proper mindset and understanding for designing schemas for NoSQL databases like MongoDB. Here is the nice set of articles from MongoDB blog on 6 Rules of Thumb for MongoDB Schema Design By William Zola, Lead Technical Support Engineer at MongoDB.

The post Rules of Thumb for MongoDB Schema Design appeared first on PBDesk.
